title: Kled is LITERALLY a boosted animal...

replies.body:
So is Nunu.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Feels bad man
how about {{champion:113}}

> [{quoted}](name=dboss345,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mXMqmw4A,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-07-28T00:12:29.092+0000)
>
> how about {{champion:113}}

{{champion:133}} as well with her Valor carrying her, wow didn't realize how many boosted animals existed in league
But they're not animals. The animals are the boosters.
Only Boosted Animals will play him

I'm an unranked boosted animal.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
No one said it was a successful boost.
The thing is you can't be a boosted animal unless you yourself are an animal. Hence why Kled is the only champion who qualifies!

> [{quoted}](name=Dicerson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mXMqmw4A,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-07-28T02:27:43.483+0000)
>
> The thing is you can't be a boosted animal unless you yourself are an animal. Hence why Kled is the only champion who qualifies!

*implying that yordles are animals*
*TRIGGERED*

seriously though, don't be racist towards the nonexistent species who only exist in our collective imagination.
The thing is they never said people weren't animals(which they are taxonomy-wise), and I'm very sure yordles would also qualify as animals if they existed.

> [{quoted}](name=Quadriplegic dog,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mXMqmw4A,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-07-29T07:46:33.702+0000)
>
> The thing is they never said people weren't animals(which they are taxonomy-wise), and I'm very sure yordles would also qualify as animals if they existed.

Ignoring their rights as citizens of Runeterra. They are a sapient race living with their own communities, both within and without human communities. If we were to contact a race from some island lost in the pacific, we would still treat them as humans, even if we had vast cultural and genetic differences. That's why we got rid of slavery, and that's why Yordles ain't no dogs.
but taxonomy bro

> [{quoted}](name=Quadriplegic dog,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mXMqmw4A,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-01T07:58:43.400+0000)
>
> but taxonomy bro

Human rights trump it. Similarly, if we're going by earth-based taxonomy, Yordles are supposed to have come from space.

He is legitimately weak when Skarl leaves him and I love it. He has the lowest MS in the game, only 2 abilities, and no bonus health. He's actually fragile and helpless during his supposed window of vulnerability unlike another champion of similar design 

_cough{{champion:150}}cough_

Gnar wasn't designed to be vulnerable in his base form. He was suppose to be a more dynamic form changing champion, who couldn't change whenever he wanted to so that he wasn't just a champ with 6 abilities and no ult (like Elise, Jayce, nid).

His large form is stronger (especially in teamfights), that's on purpose, but by no means is he suppose to be weak as mini-gnar.
Pre6 Mega Gnar is miles worse than Mini Gnar.

This is right, Gnar is more vulnerable in this form but, he can't control when he transforms, his only real window to jump on him is when his passive is down and you can kill before he gets full rage up to maybe escape or kill you
Skaarl stop boosting!!
I want an autoban as soon as skaarl flees.

{{champion:20}} {{champion:113}}  are already carried by animals
{{champion:133}} if you include her ult
No wonder NightBlue3 was so fast in making a video...
And he is also slow as fuck and weak as fuck when not getting carried!

{{champion:42}} Who needs animals when you got copters?
{{champion:68}} That don't suit you? How about a mech?
that joke would be funny if i havent seen it 100 times already
